components.name: JavaTaskCheckSum
components.raw_content:
<process name="JavaTaskCheckSum">
	<sequence>
		<operation name="JavaTaskSample">
			<participant name="JavaTask"/>
			<output message="Xout">
				<assign to="srcLocationMode">inline</assign>
				<assign to="javaSrc">
import com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.workflow.Document;
import com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.workflow.WFCBase;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils;

String digest = null;
Document document = new Document();
Document srcDoc = wfc.getPrimaryDocument();
InputStream is = srcDoc.getInputStream();

try {
  digest = DigestUtils.md5Hex(is);
  wfc.setBasicStatus(WFCBase.SUCCESS);
  wfc.addWFContent("CheckSum", digest.toString());
} catch (Exception ex) {
  wfc.setBasicStatus(WFCBase.ERROR);
  wfc.addWFContent("CheckSumError", ex.getMessage());
}
return "000";
				</assign>
				<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
			</output>
			<input message="Xin">
				<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
			</input>
		</operation>
	</sequence>
</process>

components.name: CodeListEditorWeb

This/sqlMain.from: concat("SELECT * FROM CODELIST_XREF_ITEM WHERE CODELIST_XREF_ITEM.LIST_NAME = '",/ProcessData/sLN/text(),"' AND CODELIST_XREF_ITEM.LIST_VERSION = (SELECT DEFAULT_VERSION FROM CODELIST_XREF_VERS WHERE CODELIST_XREF_VERS.LIST_NAME = '",/ProcessData/sLN/text(),"')")

config.This/W3: AND SENDER_ID IS NULL AND RECEIVER_ID IS NULL

components.raw_content:
<process name="CodeListEditorWeb">
  <rule name="list_name">
    <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/sLN) > 0</condition>
  </rule>

  <rule name="http_method_post">
    <condition>string(/ProcessData/http-method) = "POST"</condition>
  </rule>

  <rule name="http_method_get">
    <condition>string(/ProcessData/http-method) = "GET"</condition>
  </rule>

  <rule name="no_parameters">
    <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/sLN) = 0 and
        string-length(/ProcessData/sSIt) = 0 and
        string-length(/ProcessData/sRIt) = 0</condition>
  </rule>

  <rule name="is_new_page">
    <condition>string(/ProcessData/ResponseData/newpage) = "New Page"</condition>
  </rule>

  <rule name="search_has_results">
    <condition>string(/ProcessData/ResponseData/searchpage) = "Search Page" and count(/ProcessData/Result1/Row1) > 0</condition>
  </rule>

  <rule name="update_has_results">
    <condition>string(/ProcessData/ResponseData/updatepage) = "Update Page" and count(/ProcessData/Result1/Row1) > 0</condition>
  </rule>

  <sequence>
    <assign to="/ProcessData/This/databasePool">db2Pool</assign>
    <choice>
      <select>
        <case ref="http_method_get" activity="GET"/>
        <case ref="http_method_post" activity="POST"/>
      </select>

      <sequence name="GET">
        <choice>
          <select>
            <case ref="list_name" activity="SearchListName"/>
            <case ref="no_parameters" activity="NewPage"/>
          </select>

          <sequence name="SearchListName">
            <operation name="AssignService">
              <participant name="AssignService"/>
              <output message="AssignOutputMessage">
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
                <assign to="/ProcessData/ResponseData/searchpage">Search Page</assign>
                <assign to="This/sqlMain" from="concat("SELECT * FROM CODELIST_XREF_ITEM WHERE CODELIST_XREF_ITEM.LIST_NAME = '",/ProcessData/sLN/text(),"' AND CODELIST_XREF_ITEM.LIST_VERSION = (SELECT DEFAULT_VERSION FROM CODELIST_XREF_VERS WHERE CODELIST_XREF_VERS.LIST_NAME = '",/ProcessData/sLN/text(),"')")"></assign>
                <assign to="This/sqlSender" from="if (string-length(/ProcessData/sSIt) > 0,concat(" AND SENDER_ITEM like '%",/ProcessData/sSIt/text(),"%'"),"")"></assign>
                <assign to="This/sqlReceiver" from="if (string-length(/ProcessData/sRIt) > 0,concat(" AND RECEIVER_ITEM like '%",/ProcessData/sRIt/text(),"%'"),"")"></assign>
                <assign to="This/sqlSelect" from="concat(This/sqlMain,This/sqlSender,This/sqlReceiver)"></assign>
              </output>
              <input message="AssignInputMessage">
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
              </input>
            </operation>

            <operation name="Lightweight JDBC Adapter">
              <participant name="LightweightJDBCAdapterQuery"/>
              <output message="LightweightJDBCAdapterTypeInputMessage">
                <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                <assign to="pool" from="/ProcessData/This/databasePool/text()"></assign>
                <assign to="query_type">SELECT</assign>
                <assign to="result_name">Result1</assign>
                <assign to="row_name">Row1</assign>
                <assign to="sql" from="/ProcessData/This/sqlSelect/text()"></assign>
              </output>
              <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="." from="DocToDOM(PrimaryDocument)"></assign>
              </input>
            </operation>
          </sequence>
          <sequence name="NewPage">
            <assign to="/ProcessData/ResponseData/newpage">New Page</assign>
          </sequence>
        </choice>
      </sequence>

      <sequence name="POST">


        <operation name="AssignService">
          <participant name="AssignService"/>
          <output message="AssignOutputMessage">
            <assign to="." from="*"/>
            <assign to="/ProcessData/ResponseData/updatepage">Update Page</assign>
            <assign to="This/P1">UPDATE CODELIST_XREF_ITEM SET</assign>
            <assign to="This/F1" from="concat(" SENDER_ITEM = '",/ProcessData/HttpURLDecodedValues/mSIt/text(),"',")"></assign>
            <assign to="This/F2" from="concat(" RECEIVER_ITEM = '",/ProcessData/HttpURLDecodedValues/mRIt/text(),"',")"></assign>
            <assign to="This/F3" from="concat(" DESCRIPTION = '",/ProcessData/HttpURLDecodedValues/mDesc/text(),"',")"></assign>
            <assign to="This/F4" from="concat(" TEXT1 = '",/ProcessData/HttpURLDecodedValues/mT1/text(),"',")"></assign>
            <assign to="This/F5" from="concat(" TEXT2 = '",/ProcessData/HttpURLDecodedValues/mT2/text(),

components.name: Demo_BP_CopyMultipleFilesFromFSA2MBX
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_CopyMultipleFilesFromFSA2MBX">
  <rule name="more_docs">
    <condition>//FSADoc.DONE = 0</condition>
  </rule>

  <sequence name="Sequence Start">
    <operation name="File System Adapter">
      <participant name="Generic_FSA_Adapter"/>
      <output message="FileSystemInputMessage">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
        <assign to="Action">FS_COLLECT</assign>
        <assign to="collectionFolder">C:\Temp\</assign>
        <assign to="collectMultiple">true</assign>
        <assign to="deleteAfterCollect">false</assign>
        <assign to="filter">*.txt</assign>
        <assign to="noFilesSetSuccess">true</assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <sequence name="forEachDoc">
      <operation name="For Each Document">
        <participant name="ForEachDocument"/>
        <output message="ForEachDocumentTypeInputMessage">
          <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
          <assign to="DOCUMENT_KEY_PREFIX">FSA_Document</assign>
          <assign to="ITERATOR_NAME">FSADoc</assign>
        </output>
        <input message="inmsg">
          <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
        </input>
      </operation>

      <choice name="Choice Start">
        <select>
          <case ref="more_docs" activity="addDoc"/>
        </select>

        <sequence name="addDoc">
          <assign name="Assign" to="PrimaryDocument" from="FSADoc/@SCIObjectId"></assign>
          <assign name="Assign" to="MessageName" from="FSADoc.NAME/text()"></assign>
          <assign name="Assign" to="DocumentId" from="FSADoc/@SCIObjectId"></assign>
          
          <operation name="Mailbox Add Service">
            <participant name="MailboxAdd"/>
            <output message="MailboxAddServiceTypeInputMessage">
              <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
              <assign to="MailboxPath">/Inbox</assign>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
              <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
            </input>
          </operation>

          <repeat name="endLoop" ref="forEachDoc"/>

        </sequence>
      </choice>
    </sequence>
  </sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_LineFolding
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_LineFolding">
<sequence>
<assign to="LineFoldLength">240</assign>

<operation name="FileFolding">
	<participant name="JavaTask"/>
	<output message="Xout" >
	<assign to="srcLocationMode">inline</assign>
	<assign to="javaSrc">import java.io.BufferedReader; 
import java.io.InputStreamReader; 
import java.io.PrintStream; 
import com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.workflow.WorkFlowContext; 
import com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.workflow.WorkFlowException; 
import com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.workflow.Document; 
 
String strFoldLen = wfc.getParm("LineFoldLength"); 
int foldLen = new Integer(strFoldLen).intValue(); 

Document srcDoc = wfc.getPrimaryDocument(); 
Document foldDoc = wfc.newDocument(); 
 
BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(srcDoc.getInputStream())); 
PrintStream writer = new PrintStream(foldDoc.getOutputStream()); 
 
String line = ""; 
while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) { 
    String foldStr = line.replaceAll("(.{" + foldLen + "})", "$1\n"); 
    writer.println(foldStr); 
} 
 
writer.close(); 
reader.close(); 
 
wfc.putPrimaryDocument(foldDoc); 
return "OK"; </assign>
	<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
	</output>
	<input message="Xin" >
	<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
	</input>
</operation>
</sequence>
</process>

            <participant name="TimestampUtilService" />

                <assign to="format">'D'yyyyMMdd.'S'HHmm</assign>

                <assign to="keywordtype2">string</assign>
                <assign to="replace2" from="string('')"></assign>
                <assign to="keyword3">X</assign>
                <assign to="keywordtype3">string</assign>
                <assign to="replace3" from="string('')"></assign>
                <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
            <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
            </input>
        </operation>

        <operation name="Get Document Information Service">
            <participant name="GetDocumentInfoService" />
            <output message="GetDocumentInfoServiceTypeInputMessage">
                <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
            <assign to="TestInfo" from="*"></assign>
            </input>
        </operation>



        <choice name="forEachFile">
            <select>
                <case ref="This/FileCounter" activity="proceed" />
            </select>

            <sequence name="proceed">
                <assign name="Assign" to="MessageName" from="concat(This/FilenamePrefix, This/TimeStamp/time/text(), '.' ,This/FileCounter/text())"></assign>

                <operation name="Mailbox Add Service">
                    <participant name="MailboxAdd" />
                    <output message="MailboxAddServiceTypeInputMessage">
                        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                        <assign to="MailboxPath" from="/ProcessData/This/MailboxPath"></assign>
                    </output>
                    <input message="inmsg">
                    <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                    </input>
                </operation>

                <assign name="Assign" to="This/FileCounter" from="number(/ProcessData/This/FileCounter/text())-1">
                </assign>

                <repeat name="endLoop" ref="forEachFile" />
            </sequence>
        </choice>
    </sequence>
</process>

components.name: JavaTaskGzipCompress
components.raw_content:
<process name="JavaTaskGzipCompress">
<sequence>
<operation name="GzipCompress">
	<participant name="JavaTask"/>
	<output message="Xout" >
	<assign to="srcLocationMode">inline</assign>
	<assign to="javaSrc">
import com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.workflow.Document;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream;

try {
    String fileName = "myfilename.gz";

    Document doc = wfc.getPrimaryDocument();
    String bodyNameInput = doc.getBodyName();
    wfc.addWFContent("DocumentNameInput",bodyNameInput); 

    // Open the file for reading
    InputStream is = doc.getBodyInputStream();
    BufferedInputStream bis = new BufferedInputStream(is);


    // Open the gzip file for writing
    Document newDoc = new Document();
    OutputStream os = newDoc.getOutputStream();

    //FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(fileName + ".gz");
    //GZIPOutputStream gzos = new GZIPOutputStream(fos, 9);
    GZIPOutputStream gzos = new GZIPOutputStream(os, 9);
    BufferedOutputStream bos = new BufferedOutputStream(gzos);

    // Write the compressed data
    byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];
    int bytesRead;
    while ((bytesRead = bis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
    bos.write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);
    }

    // Close the streams
    bos.close();
    bis.close();

    //String newContent = "This is the content of the new Primary Document";
    //Document newDoc = new Document();
    //OutputStream os = newDoc.getOutputStream();
    //os.write(newContent.getBytes());
    os.flush();
    os.close();
    wfc.putPrimaryDocument(newDoc);
    wfc.addWFContent("DocumentNameOutput",fileName); 
} catch (IOException e) {
    log.log("Error: " + e.getMessage());
}
return "OK";
    </assign>
	<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
	</output>
	<input message="Xin" >
	<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
	</input>
</operation>
</sequence>
</process>

                <assign to="LDAPAdapter/request/param.1">(objectClass=groupOfNames)</assign>
                <assign to="LDAPAdapter/request/param.1/@usage">Search</assign>

                <assign to="LDAPAdapter/request/param.2/@usage">Input</assign>

components.name: Demo_BP_RenameRegexJavaTask
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_RenameRegexJavaTask">
<sequence>
<assign to="fileName">XYZ_AB_0193_20012021_001594.TXT</assign>
<assign to="matchPattern">XYZ_(.+)_(\d{4})_(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{4})_(\d{3})(\d{3}).TXT</assign>
<assign to="replacePattern">CB_$5$4$3_$7.TXT</assign>

<operation name="RegexMapTest">
	<participant name="JavaTask"/>
	<output message="Xout" >
	<assign to="srcLocationMode">inline</assign>
	<assign to="javaSrc">
  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
  import java.util.regex.Pattern;

	String fileName = (String)wfc.getWFContent("fileName");
	String matchPattern = (String)wfc.getWFContent("matchPattern");
	String replacePattern = (String)wfc.getWFContent("replacePattern");

  Pattern p1 = Pattern.compile(matchPattern);
  Matcher m1 = p1.matcher(fileName);

  if (m1.find( )) {
    String output = m1.replaceFirst(replacePattern);
    wfc.addWFContent("resultFilename", output);
  } else {
    wfc.addWFContent("resultFilename", fileName);
    wfc.addWFContent("nomatch", "true");
  }

	return "OK";</assign>
	<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
	</output>
	<input message="Xin" >
	<assign to="." from="*"></assign>
	</input>
</operation>
</sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_Append_List
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_Append_List">
    <rule name="has_next">
        <condition>count(/ProcessData/List/Item) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <sequence>
        <assign to="List/Item">U001</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U002</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U003</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U004</assign>

        <assign to="ItemsList">.</assign>
        
        <choice name="forEachItem">
            <select>
                <case ref="has_next" activity="AddItem"/>
            </select>

            <sequence name="AddItem">
                <assign name="Assign" to="ItemsList" from="if( ItemsList = '.', List/Item[1]/text(), concat(ItemsList, ',' ,List/Item[1]/text()))"></assign>

                <operation name="Release Service">
                    <participant name="ReleaseService"/>
                    <output message="ReleaseServiceTypeInputMessage">
                        <assign to="TARGET">/ProcessData/List/Item[1]</assign>
                        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                    </output>
                    <input message="inmsg">
                        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                    </input>
                </operation>

                <repeat name="endLoop" ref="forEachItem"/>

            </sequence>
        </choice>
    </sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_Append_List
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_Append_List">
    <rule name="has_next">
        <condition>count(/ProcessData/List/Item) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="skip_item">
        <condition>/ProcessData/List/Item[1]/text = 'U002'</condition>
    </rule>

    <sequence>
        <assign to="List/Item">U001</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U002</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U003</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U004</assign>
        <assign to="ItemsList">.</assign>
        <choice name="forEachItem">
            <select>
                <case ref="has_next" activity="nextItem"/>
            </select>

            <sequence name="nextItem">
                <choice name="AddItem">
                    <select>
                        <case ref="skip_item" negative="true" activity="AddItemSeq"/>
                    </select>

                    <sequence name="AddItemSeq">
                        <assign name="Assign" to="ItemsList" from="if( ItemsList = '.', List/Item[1]/text(), concat(ItemsList, ',' ,List/Item[1]/text()))"></assign>
                    </sequence>
                </choice>
                <operation name="Release Service">
                    <participant name="ReleaseService"/>
                    <output message="ReleaseServiceTypeInputMessage">
                        <assign to="TARGET">/ProcessData/List/Item[1]</assign>
                        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                    </output>
                    <input message="inmsg">
                        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                    </input>
                </operation>

                <repeat name="endLoop" ref="forEachItem"/>

            </sequence>
        </choice>
    </sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_Append_List
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_Append_List">
    <rule name="moreItens">
        <condition>total >= number(counter/text())</condition>
    </rule>

    <sequence>
        <assign to="List/Item">U001</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U002</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U003</assign>
        <assign to="List/Item" append="true">U004</assign>
        <assign to="total" from="count(/ProcessData/List/Item)"></assign>
        <assign to="ItemsList">.</assign>
        <assign to="counter">1</assign>
        <sequence name="loopStart">
            <choice>
                <select>
                    <case ref="moreItens" activity="choiceStart"/>
                </select>
                <sequence name="choiceStart">
                    <sequence name="taskStart">

                        <assign to="CurrentItem" from="List/Item[number(/ProcessData/counter/text())]/text()"/>
                        <assign to="ItemsList" from="if( ItemsList = '.', CurrentItem/text(), concat(ItemsList, ',' ,CurrentItem/text()))"></assign>

                        <assign to="counter" from="counter + 1"/>
                    </sequence>
                    <repeat ref="loopStart"/>
                </sequence>
            </choice>
        </sequence>
    </sequence>
</process>

components.name: MAILBOX_DELETE_FILE_RUNTASK
components.raw_content:
<process name="MAILBOX_DELETE_FILE_RUNTASK">
<rule name="DelMsgCntGreaterZero">
  <condition>count(/ProcessData/DeleteResults/Message/MessageId)>0</condition>
 </rule>

 <sequence name="CDServerSnodeCallbackBP">
   <assign to="This/ReturnCode">0</assign>
   <assign to="This/MessageNamePattern" from="substring-before(substring-after(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/Forwarding/Sysopts/text(),'filename='),';')"/>
	 <assign to="This/MailboxPath" from="if(contains(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/Forwarding/Sysopts/text(),'mailbox='),
                                      substring-before(substring-after(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/Forwarding/Sysopts/text(),'mailbox='),';'),
                                      '/Inbox')"></assign>
   

    <operation name="Mailbox Delete Service">
    <participant name="MailboxDelete"/>
    <output message="DeleteRequest">
      <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      <assign to="MailboxPath" from="string(/ProcessData/This/MailboxPath)"/>
      <assign to="MessageNamePattern" from="string(/ProcessData/This/MessageNamePattern)"/>
      <assign to="MailboxSelection">choose</assign>
      <assign to="MessageExtractable">ALL</assign>
    </output>
    <input message="inmsg">
      <assign to="DeleteResults" from="*"></assign>
    </input>
    </operation>

    <choice name="MessagenNotDeleted">
    <select>
      <case ref="DelMsgCntGreaterZero" negative="true" activity="message_not_deleted"/>
    </select>
    <sequence name="message_not_deleted">
      <assign name="Assign" to="CDServerNodeData/CallbackReturnCount">8</assign>
    </sequence>
    </choice>	


     <!-- Return (0) as failure success to caller  -->
     <assign to="CDServerNodeData/CallbackReturnCount" from="/ProcessData/This/ReturnCode/text()"></assign>

    <operation name="CD Server BP Response Service">
        <participant name="CDServerBPResponse"/>
        <output message="CDServerBPResponseServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
        </output>
        <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
        </input>
    </operation>

    <onFault>
     <sequence name="On Fault Sequence Start">
        <!-- Return (8) as failure status to caller  -->
       <assign to="CDServerNodeData/CallbackReturnCount">8</assign>

       <operation name="CD Server BP Response Service">
         <participant name="CDServerBPResponse"/>
         <output message="CDServerBPResponseServiceTypeInputMessage">
           <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
         </output>
         <input message="inmsg">
           <assign to="OnFaultCDServerBPResponseResults" from="*"></assign>
         </input>
       </operation>
     </sequence>
   </onFault>
 </sequence>
</process>

components.name: MAILBOX_GET_INDEX_CDP_ADV
components.raw_content:
<process name="MAILBOX_GET_INDEX_CDP_ADV">
  <rule name="os_windows">
   <condition>contains(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'os=windows')</condition>
  </rule>
  <rule name="os_unix">
   <condition>contains(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'os=unix')</condition>
  </rule>
  <rule name="os_other">
   <condition>contains(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'os=other')</condition>
  </rule>
  <rule name="has_filter">
   <condition>contains(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'fi=')</condition>
  </rule>
  <rule name="has_mailboxpath">
   <condition>contains(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'mbx=')</condition>
  </rule>

  <sequence name="CDServerSnodeCallbackBP">

    <operation name="AssignService">
      <participant name="AssignService"/>
      <output message="AssignOutputMessage">
        <assign to="." from="*"/>
        <assign to="This/SlashType">\</assign>
        <assign to="This/Dummy">/* Dummy Comment */</assign>
        <assign to="This/MailboxPath">/Inbox</assign>
        <assign to="This/MessageNamePattern">*</assign>
      </output>
      <input message="AssignInputMessage">
        <assign to="." from="*"/>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <choice name="OSType">
      <select>
        <case ref="os_windows" activity="osWindows"/>
        <case ref="os_unix" activity="osUnix"/>
        <case ref="os_other" activity="osOther"/>
      </select>

      <sequence name="osWindows">
        <assign to="This/SlashType">\</assign>
      </sequence>
      
      <sequence name="osUnix">
        <assign to="This/SlashType">/</assign>
        <assign to="This/Dummy">RUNECHO RUN TASK PNODE SYSOPTS="echo Dummy"</assign>
      </sequence>
      
      <sequence name="osOther">
        <assign to="This/SlashType">_</assign>
      </sequence>
    </choice>

    <choice name="HasFilter">
      <select>
        <case ref="has_filter" activity="setFilter"/>
      </select>

      <sequence name="setFilter">
        <assign to="This/MessageNamePattern" from="substring-before(substring-after(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'fi='),';')"/>
      </sequence>
    </choice>

    <choice name="HasMailboxPath">
      <select>
        <case ref="has_mailboxpath" activity="setMailboxPath"/>
      </select>

      <sequence name="setMailboxPath">
        <assign to="This/MailboxPath" from="translate(substring-before(substring-after(/ProcessData/CDServerNodeData/RemoteFileName/text(),'mbx='),';'),'@','/')"/>
      </sequence>
    </choice>


    <operation name="Mailbox Query Service">
      <participant name="MailboxQuery"/>
      <output message="MailboxQueryServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
        <assign to="MailboxPath" from="This/MailboxPath/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="MessageExtractable">YES</assign>
        <assign to="MessageNamePattern" from="This/MessageNamePattern/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="OrderBy">MessageId</assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="This/PullList" from="Message/MessageName"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <operation name="XSLT Service">
      <participant name="XSLTService"/>
      <output message="XSLTServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="input_pd_xpath">/ProcessData/This</assign>
        <assign to="xml_input_from">ProcData</assign>
        <assign to="xml_input_validation">NO</assign>
        <assign to="xslt_name">PullListCdpAdv</assign>
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <assign to="RemoteFileName">PullFileList</assign>

    <!-- Return (0) as failure success to caller -->
    <assign to="CDServerNodeData/CallbackReturnCount">0</assign>

    <operation name="CD Server BP Response Service">
      <participant name="CDServerBPResponse"/>
      <output message="CDServerBPResponseServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <onFault>
      <sequence name="On Fault Sequence Start">
        <!-- Return (8) as failure status to caller -->
        <assign to="CDServerNodeData/CallbackReturnCount">8</assign>

        <operation name="CD Server BP Response Service">
          <participant name="CDServerBPResponse"/>
          <output message="CDServerBPResponseServiceTypeInputMessage">
            <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
          </output>
          <input message="inmsg">
            <assign to="OnFaultCDServerBPResponseResults" from="*"></assign>
          </input>
        </operation>
      </sequence>
    </onFault>
  </sequence>
</process>

components.name: SFGAdvancedSearchWeb
components.raw_content:
<process name = "SFGAdvancedSearchWeb"> 

    <rule name="partner_name">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/partnerName) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="partner_code">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/partnerCode) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="login_id">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/loginId) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="first_name">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/firstName) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="last_name">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/lastName) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="first_name_last_name">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/firstName) > 0 and string-length(/ProcessData/lastName) > 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="no_parameters">
        <condition>string-length(/ProcessData/partnerName) = 0 and
        string-length(/ProcessData/partnerCode) = 0 and
        string-length(/ProcessData/loginId) = 0 and
        string-length(/ProcessData/firstName) = 0 and
        string-length(/ProcessData/lastName) = 0</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="is_new_page">
        <condition>string(/ProcessData/ResponseData/newpage) = "Is New Page"</condition>
    </rule>

    <rule name="has_results">
        <condition>count(/ProcessData/Result1/Row1) > 0</condition>
    </rule>


    <sequence>
    <choice>
        <select>
            <case ref="partner_name" activity="PartnerName" />
            <case ref="partner_code" activity="PartnerCode" />
            <case ref="login_id" activity="LoginID" />
            <case ref="first_name_last_name" activity="FirstNameLastName" />
            <case ref="first_name" activity="FirstName" />
            <case ref="last_name" activity="LastName" />
            <case ref="no_parameters" activity="NoParams" />
        </select>
        
<!-- 
    select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,O.ORGANIZATION_KEY,U.LOGINID,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME
    from YFS_ORGANIZATION as O, YFS_USER as U, YFS_PERSON_INFO as P
    where 
        O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and
-->

        <sequence name="PartnerName">
            <assign to="This/sql" from="concat("select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,TRIM(O.ORGANIZATION_KEY) as OKEY,TRIM(U.LOGINID) as LOGIN,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME from YFS_ORGANIZATION O, YFS_USER U, YFS_PERSON_INFO P where O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and O.ORGANIZATION_NAME='",/ProcessData/partnerName/text(),"'")"></assign>
        </sequence>

        <sequence name="PartnerCode">
            <assign to="This/sql" from="concat("select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,TRIM(O.ORGANIZATION_KEY) as OKEY,TRIM(U.LOGINID) as LOGIN,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME from YFS_ORGANIZATION O, YFS_USER U, YFS_PERSON_INFO P where O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and O.ORGANIZATION_KEY='",/ProcessData/partnerCode/text(),"'")"></assign>
        </sequence>

        <sequence name="LoginID">
            <assign to="This/sql" from="concat("select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,TRIM(O.ORGANIZATION_KEY) as OKEY,TRIM(U.LOGINID) as LOGIN,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME from YFS_ORGANIZATION O, YFS_USER U, YFS_PERSON_INFO P where O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and U.LOGINID='",/ProcessData/loginId/text(),"'")"></assign>
        </sequence>

        <sequence name="FirstNameLastName">
            <assign to="This/sql" from="concat("select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,TRIM(O.ORGANIZATION_KEY) as OKEY,TRIM(U.LOGINID) as LOGIN,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME from YFS_ORGANIZATION O, YFS_USER U, YFS_PERSON_INFO P where O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and P.FIRST_NAME like '%",/ProcessData/firstName/text(),"%' and LOWER(P.LAST_NAME) like LOWER('%",/ProcessData/lastName/text(),"%')")"></assign>
        </sequence>

        <sequence name="FirstName">
            <assign to="This/sql" from="concat("select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,TRIM(O.ORGANIZATION_KEY) as OKEY,TRIM(U.LOGINID) as LOGIN,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME from YFS_ORGANIZATION O, YFS_USER U, YFS_PERSON_INFO P where O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and LOWER(P.FIRST_NAME) like LOWER('%",/ProcessData/firstName/text(),"%')")"></assign>
        </sequence>

        <sequence name="LastName">
            <assign to="This/sql" from="concat("select O.ORGANIZATION_NAME,TRIM(O.ORGANIZATION_KEY) as OKEY,TRIM(U.LOGINID) as LOGIN,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME from YFS_ORGANIZATION O, YFS_USER U, YFS_PERSON_INFO P where O.ORGANIZATION_KEY = U.ORGANIZATION_KEY and U.BILLINGADDRESS_KEY = P.PERSON_INFO_KEY and LOWER(P.LAST_NAME) like LOWER('%",/ProcessDa

components.name: Demo_BP_RouteViaCustomFTP
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_RouteViaCustomFTP">
    <rule name="renameFile?">
        <condition>string(/ProcessData/customftp_FtpRename) = 'yes'</condition>
    </rule>
    <rule name="changeDirectory?">
        <condition>normalize-space(/ProcessData/FtpBeginSessionServiceResults/TPProfile/Directory/text()) != ''</condition>
    </rule>
    
    <sequence>
<!-- Get obscured password -->
    <operation name="Obscure Password">
      <participant name="FTPClientObscureParameter"/>
      <output message="outmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

        <assign name="Temp File Prefix" to="TempPrefix">TEMP</assign>
        <assign to="TempRemotePasswd" from="/ProcessData/customftp_RemotePasswd/text()"></assign>  
        <assign to="TempRev2" from="revealObscured(/ProcessData/customftp_RemotePasswd)"></assign>     
        <choice name="Check to rename file">
            <select>
                <case ref="renameFile?" activity="renameFile"/>
            </select>
            <assign name="renameFile" to="RemoteFileName" from="concat(string(TempPrefix),string(RemoteFileName))"/>
        </choice>
        <operation name="FTP BEGIN SESSION SERVICE">
            <participant name="FTPClientBeginSession"/>
            <output message="BeginSessionRequest">
                <assign to="FTPClientAdapter">FTPClientAdapter</assign>
                <assign to="RemoteHost"   from="/ProcessData/customftp_RemoteHost/text()"></assign> 
                <assign to="RemotePort"   from="/ProcessData/customftp_RemotePort/text()"></assign>
                <assign to="RemoteUserId" from="/ProcessData/customftp_RemoteUserId/text()"></assign> 
                <assign to="RemotePasswd" from="revealObscured(/ProcessData/Demo_Remote_FTP)"></assign>   
                <assign to="UsingRevealedPasswd">true</assign>
                <assign to="ConnectionRetries" from="/ProcessData/customftp_NoOfRetries/text()"/>
                <assign to="RetryDelay" from="/ProcessData/customftp_RetriesInterval/text()"/>
                <assign to="ResponseTimeout" from="/ProcessData/ResponseTimeout/text()"/>
		<assign to="ClearControlChannel" from="/ProcessData/ClearControlChannel/text()"/>
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="FtpBeginSessionServiceResults" from="*"/>
            </input>
        </operation>
        <choice name="Check to change directory">
            <select>
                <case ref="changeDirectory?" activity="changeDir"/>
            </select>
            <operation name="changeDir">
                <participant name="FTPClientCd"/> 
                <output message="CdRequest"> 
                    <assign to="SessionToken" from="/ProcessData/FtpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"/> 
                    <assign to="Directory" from="/ProcessData/FtpBeginSessionServiceResults/TPProfile/Directory/text()"/> 
                </output> 
                <input message="inmsg"> 
                    <assign to="FTPClientCdResults" from="*"></assign> 
                </input> 
            </operation>
        </choice>
        <operation name="FTP PUT SERVICE">
            <participant name="FTPClientPut"/>
            <output message="PutRequest">
                <assign to="RepresentationType">BINARY</assign>
                <assign to="SessionToken" from="/ProcessData/FtpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"/>
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="PutResult" from="*"/>
            </input>
        </operation>
        <choice name="Check to move file">
            <select>
                <case ref="renameFile?" activity="moveFile"/>
            </select>
            <operation name="moveFile">
                <participant name="FTPClientMove"/>
                <output message="FTPClientMoveServiceTypeInputMessage">
                    <assign to="RemoteFromFileName" from="string(RemoteFileName)"/>
                    <assign to="RemoteToFileName" from="substring-after(string(RemoteFileName),string(TempPrefix))"/>
                    <assign to="SessionToken" from="/ProcessData/FtpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"/>
                </output>
                <input message="inmsg">
                    <assign to="FTPClientMoveServiceResults" from="*"/>
                </input>
            </operation>
        </choice>
        <operation name="FTP END SESSION SERVICE">
            <participant name="FTPClientEndSession"/>
            <output message="EndSessionRequest">
                <assign to="SessionToken" from="/ProcessData/FtpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"/>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="FtpEndSessionResults" from="*"/>

components.name: Demo_BP_RouteViaCustomProtocol
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_RouteViaCustomProtocol">
  <sequence>
        <assign name="Assign" to="This/Env">PRD</assign>
        <assign name="Assign" to="This/Prefix">ABC</assign>
        <assign name="Assign" to="This/Suffix">XYZ</assign>
        <!-- DestinationMessageName-->

        <operation name="Get_Current_Time">
            <participant name="TimestampUtilService"/>
            <output message="xout">
                <assign to="action" from="'current_time'"/>
                <assign to="format">yyyy-MM-dd.HH-mm-ss-SSS</assign>
            </output>
            <input message="xin">
                <assign to="This/TimeStamp" from="*"/>
            </input>
        </operation>

        <assign name="Assign" to="This/Filename" from="concat(This/Env, '.', This/Prefix, '.', This/TimeStamp/time/text(), '.txt')"></assign>
        <assign name="Assign" to="DestinationMessageName" from="This/Filename/text()"></assign>

        <operation name="File System Adapter">
            <participant name="Generic_FSA_Adapter"/>
                <output message="FileSystemInputMessage">
                    <assign to="extractionFolder">/home/siuser/CustomProtocol</assign>
                    <assign to="assignFilename">true</assign>
                    <assign to="assignedFilename" from="DestinationMessageName/text()"/>
                    <assign to="Action">FS_EXTRACT</assign>
                    <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                </output>
                <input message="inmsg">
                    <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
                </input>
        </operation>
	  
        <operation name="FileGatewayRouteEventService">
            <participant name="FileGatewayRouteEventService"/>
            <output message="output">
                <assign to="." from="RouteEntityKey"/>
                <assign to="." from="RouteEntityType"/>
                <assign to="." from="RouteDataflowId"/>
                <assign to="." from="RouteMetadata"/>
                <assign to="EventCode">CUST_0003</assign>
                <assign to="ExceptionLevel">Normal</assign>
                <assign to="EventAttributes/ProducerName" from="ProducerName/text()" append="true"/>
                <assign to="EventAttributes/ConsumerFilename" from="DestinationMessageName/text()"/>
            </output>
            <input message="input">
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
            </input>
        </operation>
 
		<onFault>
            <sequence name="onFault Sequence">
			    <operation name="FileGatewayRouteEventService">
                      <participant name="FileGatewayRouteEventService"/>
                      <output message="output">
                          <assign to="." from="RouteEntityKey"/>
                          <assign to="." from="RouteEntityType"/>
                          <assign to="." from="RouteDataflowId"/>
                          <assign to="." from="RouteMetadata"/>
                          <assign to="EventCode">CUST_0053</assign>
                          <assign to="ExceptionLevel">Normal</assign>
                          <assign to="EventAttributes/ProducerName" from="ProducerName/text()" append="true"/>
                          <assign to="EventAttributes/ConsumerFilename" from="DestinationMessageName/text()"/>
                      </output>
                      <input message="input">
                          <assign to="." from="*"/>
                      </input>
                </operation>
                
            </sequence>
        </onFault>
    </sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_RouteViaCustomSFTP
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_RouteViaCustomSFTP">
    <rule name="changeDirectory?">
        <condition>normalize-space(/ProcessData/SftpBeginSessionServiceResults/TPProfile/Directory/text()) != ''</condition>
    </rule>
    	
    <sequence>
        <operation name="SFTP BEGIN SESSION SERVICE">
            <participant name="SFTPClientBeginSession"/>
            <output message="BeginSessionRequest">
                <assign to="SFTPClientAdapter" from="/ProcessData/customsftp_SFTPClientAdapter/text()"></assign>
                <assign to="ProfileId" from="/ProcessData/customsftp_ProfileId/text()"></assign> 
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="SftpBeginSessionServiceResults" from="*"></assign>
            </input>
        </operation>
        <choice name="Check to change directory">
            <select>
                <case ref="changeDirectory?" activity="changeDir"/>
            </select>
            <operation name="changeDir">
                <participant name="SFTPClientCd"/> 
                <output message="CdRequest"> 
                    <assign to="SessionToken" from="/ProcessData/SftpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"/> 
                    <assign to="Directory" from="/ProcessData/SftpBeginSessionServiceResults/TPProfile/Directory/text()"/> 
                </output> 
                <input message="inmsg"> 
                    <assign to="SFTPClientCdResults" from="*"></assign> 
                </input> 
            </operation>
        </choice>
        <operation name="SFTP PUT SERVICE">
            <participant name="SFTPClientPut"/>
            <output message="PutRequest">
                <assign to="SessionToken" from="SftpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"></assign>
                <assign to="RemoteFileName" from="DestinationMessageName/text()"/>
                <assign to="." from="*"/>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="PutResult" from="*"></assign>
            </input>
        </operation>

        <operation name="SFTP END SESSION SERVICE">
            <participant name="SFTPClientEndSession"/>
            <output message="EndSessionRequest">
                <assign to="SessionToken" from="SftpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"></assign>
            </output>
            <input message="inmsg">
                <assign to="SftpEndSessionServiceResults" from="*"></assign>
            </input>
        </operation>

        <onFault>
      	    <sequence name="onFault Sequence">
                <operation name="SFTP END SESSION SERVICE">
                    <participant name="SFTPClientEndSession"/>
                    <output message="EndSessionRequest">
                        <assign to="SessionToken" from="SftpBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionToken/text()"></assign>
                        <assign to="." from="ResponseTimeout"></assign>
                    </output>
                    <input message="inmsg">
                        <assign to="SftpEndSessionServiceResults" from="*"></assign>
                    </input>
                </operation>
                <operation name="generateException">
                    <participant name="BPExceptionService"/>
                    <output message="Xout">
                        <assign to="exceptionCode">Error, SFTP PUT</assign>
                        <assign to="." from="*"/>
                    </output>
                    <input message="Xin">
                        <assign to="." from="*"/>
                    </input>
                </operation>
	          </sequence>
        </onFault>
    </sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_RouteViaHttpPost
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_RouteViaHttpPost">
  <sequence name="HTTPSStart">
    <operation name="HTTP Client Begin Session Service">
      <participant name="HTTPClientBeginSession"/>
      <output message="HTTPClientBeginSessionServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="HTTPClientAdapter">HTTPClientAdapter</assign>
        <assign to="RemoteHost" from="customhttp_RemoteHost/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="RemotePort" from="customhttp_RemotePort/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="SSL">Must</assign>
        <assign to="CACertificateId" from="customhttp_CertID/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="CipherStrength">All</assign>
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <operation name="HTTP Client POST Service">
      <participant name="HTTPClientPost"/>
      <output message="HTTPClientPostServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="RawRequest">false</assign>
        <assign to="RawResponse">false</assign>
        <assign to="ResponseTimeout">1500</assign>
        <assign to="SessionToken" from="//SessionToken/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="ShowResponseCode">true</assign>
        <assign to="URI" from="customhttp_URI/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

    <operation name="HTTP Client End Session Service">
      <participant name="HTTPClientEndSession"/>
      <output message="HTTPClientEndSessionServiceTypeInputMessage">
        <assign to="SessionToken" from="//SessionToken/text()"></assign>
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>

  </sequence>
</process>

components.name: Demo_BP_RouteViaKafka
components.raw_content:
<process name="Demo_BP_RouteViaKafka">
	<sequence>
		<operation name="Kafka Client Begin Session Service">
			<participant name='KafkaBeginSessionService'/>
			<output message="xout">
				<assign to='Action'>put</assign>
				<assign to='BootStrapServers' from="//customkafka_BootStrapServers/text()" />
				<assign to='KafkaClientAdapter' from="//customkafka_KafkaClientAdapter/text()" />
				<assign to='SecurityAction' from="//customkafka_SecurityAction/text()" />
				<assign to='ProducerConfig'  from="//customkafka_ProducerConfig/text()" />
				<assign to='.' from='PrimaryDocument'/>
			</output>
			<input message="xin">
				<assign to="KafkaBeginSessionServiceResults" from="*"/>
			</input>
		</operation>
		<operation name="Kafka Client Producer Service">
			<participant name="KafkaProducerService"/>
			<output message="xout">
				<assign to="SessionID" from="//KafkaBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionID/text()"/>
				<assign to="KafkaClientAdapter" from="//KafkaBeginSessionServiceResults/KafkaClientAdapter/text()"/>
				<assign to='Topic' from="//customkafka_Topic/text()" />
				<assign to='.' from='PrimaryDocument'/>
			</output>
			<input message="xin">
				<assign to="." from="*"/>
			</input>
		</operation>
		<operation name="Kafka Client End Session Service">
			<participant name='KafkaEndSessionService'/>
			<output message="xout">
				<assign to="SessionID" from="//KafkaBeginSessionServiceResults/SessionID/text()"/>
				<assign to="KafkaClientAdapter" from="//KafkaBeginSessionServiceResults/KafkaClientAdapter/text()"/>
				<assign to='Action'>put</assign>
			</output>
			<input message="xin">
				<assign to="." from="*"/>
			</input>
		</operation>
	</sequence>
</process>

        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </output>
      <input message="inmsg">
        <assign to="." from="*"></assign>
      </input>
    </operation>
    
    <assign name="Assign" to="PrimaryDocument" from="OriginalDocument/@SCIObjectID"></assign>
  </sequence>
</process>
